name: S.O.F
description:
This is a Game for my Fourth Game Jam Participation for the  Beat the Boredom Game Jam. As an Engine I used the Unity. Nearly all the Pixel Art is drawn by myself with the PixilArt Website, as well as all the Animations.  The music is generated via. Ecrett Music and all other Sound Effects are made with Bfrx/Audacity. Because the theme of the Game Jam is "Outside", I created a game where you fish out of a lake to survive.

Credit:

Background Artwork were created by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)
https://ansimuz.itch.io/mountain-dusk-parallax-background

Controls:

Mouse 🖱️  /  Keyboard ⌨️
